creditline: The Winton Jones Endowment Fund for Prints and Drawings
description: man with curly beard and long curly hair, looking up to PL, with foreshortened facial features; knife under PL hand; rugged landscape behind figure; text at bottom:  "VI. / ASCENDIT AD COELOS, SEDET / AD DEXTERAM DEI PATRIS OM- / NIPOTENTIS."

title: Saint Bartholomew, Plate 6 from the series Christ, the Twelve Apostles, and Saint Paul
